items.summary: Implement the backend wallet read APIs needed for the Wallet Overview experience: (1) listWallets scoped to an organization, (2) getWallet by walletId (and organization authorization), and (3) getWalletOverviewResponse that returns per-wallet overview metrics for the selected organization. Enforce authorization so organization members can only access wallets for organizations they belong to, while global admins may access any organization.

Add a new Wallet Overview Page in the frontend that displays organization-scoped wallet overview data for the currently active organization from OrganizationContext. The page must load its data via React Query hooks calling the backend APIs from REQ-1 and render clear loading, empty, and error states.

Wire navigation/routing to access the new Wallet Overview Page from the existing app routing (tanstack router) and ensure the active organization selection (OrganizationSwitcher/OrganizationContext) controls which organizationâ€™s wallets are shown on the Wallet Overview Page.
